apps:property.name: hasTheWord
apps:property.value: (from:(reply) OR from:(no-reply) OR from:(noreply) OR from:(do_not_reply) OR from:(MAILER-DAEMON) OR subject:(order -re) OR subject:(invoice -re) OR subject:(receipt -re) OR ("unsubscribe") OR ("do not reply") OR ("add our e-mail") OR ("add our email")) OR ("your receipt number")
